T02D2017:76b-1: rakta ya m'anta ka s'a dha nam /
T02D2017:76b-3: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2017:76b-4: dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2017:76b-5: kun nas bla ma la btud de //
T02D2017:76b-6: lhan cig skyes dga'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2017:76b-7: gshin rje gshed sku dmar po yi //
T02D2017:76b-8: sgrub thabs gsal por bri bar bya //
T02D2017:76b-9: dang por re zhig sems can gdon pa'i bsam pa
T02D2017:76b-10: can gyi sngags pas snga dro langs te kha gtsang
T02D2017:76b-11: ba la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2017:76b-12: bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste rang gi snying gar
T02D2017:76b-13: yi ge aam dmar po yongs su gyur pa las
T02D2017:76b-14: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2017:76b-15: der yi ge h'um dmar po yongs su gyur pa
T02D2017:76b-16: las dbyug pa dkar po rdo rje'i rtse mo can
T02D2017:76b-17: mi mgos mtshan pa bsgom mo //
T02D2017:76b-18: de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'i steng
T02D2017:76b-19: du yi ge h'um kha dog dmar bo'i 'od zer
T02D2017:76b-20: gyis spyan drangs ba'i gshin rje gshed dmar po dang
T02D2017:76b-21: bla ma dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkha'i phyogs su bsam mo //
T02D2017:76b-22: de nas yi ge h'um las 'thon pa'i me tog
T02D2017:76b-23: dang spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la
T02D2017:76b-24: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2017:76b-25: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang
T02D2017:76b-26: snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas stong pa
T02D2017:77a-0: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra @77a * //
T02D2017:77a-1: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2017:77a-2: zhes pa yid kyis bklag go //
T02D2017:77a-3: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang las yi ge pam
T02D2017:77a-4: yongs su gyur pa'i padma'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D2017:77a-5: 'khor la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur
T02D2017:77a-6: pa las dbyug pa dkar po ste der yang nyi
T02D2017:77a-7: ma'i dkyil 'khor yi ge h'um gis mtshan pa'o //
T02D2017:77a-8: de las h'um yig gi 'od zer rnams kyis 'jig
T02D2017:77a-9: rten gsum bkang ste sems can mtha' dag gshin rje
T02D2017:77a-10: mthar byed kyi gzugs su byas nas h'um yig de
T02D2017:77a-11: la gzhug go // de thams cad yongs su gyur
T02D2017:77a-12: pa las bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed sku mdog
T02D2017:77a-13: dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa gsus pa 'phyang
T02D2017:77a-14: ba g-yon brkyang gi gom stabs kyis ma he la
T02D2017:77a-15: la gzhug go // bzhugs pa / phyag g-yas na
T02D2017:77a-16: dbyug pa dkar po g-yon na khrag gis yongs su
T02D2017:77a-18: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bsgreng ba /
T02D2017:77a-19: mi mgo lnga'i phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D2017:77a-20: klu la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ;
T02D2017:77a-21: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D2017:77a-22: mgul par mi mgo 'dzag pa'i phreng ba can /
T02D2017:77a-23: 'bar ba'i phreng ba dmar po'i phyogs mtha' dag khyab pa /
T02D2017:77a-25: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D2017:77a-26: spyan gsum dmar la zlum pa /
T02D2017:77a-29: rang snang gi shes rab kyis mgul nas 'khyud par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2017:77a-30: bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i shes rab ste /
T02D2017:77a-31: 'on kyang bye brag tu shes rab ni mgo bo skam po'i phreng ba can no //
T02D2017:77a-32: slad nas rang gi snying gar sna tshogs padma'i steng
T02D2017:77a-33: du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge
T02D2017:77a-34: h'um yongs su gyur pa las dbyug pa dkar po
T02D2017:77a-35: ste de'i dbus su nyi ma dmar po yi ge
T02D2017:77a-36: h'um gis brgyan pa bsgom mo //
T02D2017:77a-37: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje yi ge h'um las byung ba dang /
T02D2017:77a-38: bcom ldan 'das ma'i padma'i yi ge aa las byung ba /
T02D2017:77a-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2017:77a-40: zhes brjod cing dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pas
T02D2017:77a-41: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin bcom ldan
T02D2017:77a-43: de'i rjes la bcom ldan 'das ma'i lte ba'i 'og
T02D2017:77a-44: tu padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du
T02D2017:77b-0: yi ge hr'i:dmar po rtse mor @77b re kh'a dkar
T02D2017:77b-2: thugs ka'i sa bon gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su spyan
T02D2017:77b-3: drangs ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams snga ma bzhin
T02D2017:77b-4: mchod la dbang bskur ba'i don du gsol ba gdab
T02D2017:77b-5: par bya'o // aom aa bhi shinyca tu mam sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D2017:77b-6: de dag gis dang rin po che la sogs pas
T02D2017:77b-7: spras pa'i gser gyi bum pa ye shes kyi bdud
T02D2017:77b-8: rtsis yongs su gang bas bdag la dbang bskur zhing
T02D2017:77b-9: gur gum dang me tog la sogs pa'i char dbab
T02D2017:77b-10: pa dang rnga bo che'i sgra la sogs pa yang
T02D2017:77b-11: bsgom par bya'o // slar yang rang gi snying ga'i
T02D2017:77b-12: sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis nam mkha'i phyogs su
T02D2017:77b-13: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po spyan drangs la /
T02D2017:77b-14: snga ma bzhin yang dag par mchod de dza:h'um bam
T02D2017:77b-15: ho:zhes pa 'dis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing
T02D2017:77b-16: ba dang dbang du byas la /
T02D2017:77b-17: dam tshig sems dpa' la gnas pa'i ye shes sems
T02D2017:77b-18: dpa'i thugs kar nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge
T02D2017:77b-19: h'um la gnas pa'i hr'i:shtri:la sogs pa'i sngags kyi phreng
T02D2017:77b-20: ba 'bar bar bltas la yid kyis bzlas pa bzhin
T02D2017:77b-21: du khro bo'i tshig bzlas so //
T02D2017:77b-22: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2017:77b-23: thun gzhan la snga ma bzhin du sa bon dang
T02D2017:77b-24: phyag mtshan gyi rim pas bdag nyid bskyed la dbang
T02D2017:77b-25: bskur ba sngon du 'gro bas ye shes sems dpa'
T02D2017:77b-26: gzhug par bya'o // nyal ba'i dus su stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor bsgom zhing nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2017:77b-27: dam tshig sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa 'dis bsgom
T02D2017:77b-28: zhing bzlas na de'i gshin rje mthar byed dmar po
T02D2017:77b-29: 'di nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni
T02D2017:77b-31: rim pa 'di gshin rje mthar byad dmar po'i sbyor
T02D2017:77b-32: ba 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa dang las rab 'byams
T02D2017:77b-34: 'on kyang 'dir bye brag tu zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang /
T02D2017:77b-35: mngon spyod kyi dbye bas dkar po dang ser po
T02D2017:77b-36: dang dmar po dang nag po'i gzugs su bsgom mo
T02D2017:77b-37: // gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rnal
T02D2017:77b-38: 'byor gyi dbang phyug bi r'u pas mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2017:77b-40: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun
T02D2017:77b-41: chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal
T02D2017:77b-42: snga nas / chag lo ts'a ba dge slong chos
T02D2017:77b-43: rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
